title: Send Push Notification for Score Update
description: A fan has subscribed to receive score alerts for their favorite team. An agent must send a push notification after the team scores.

tasks.description: Receive a real-time alert that the team has scored.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a notification from the live stats feed.

tasks.description: Identify all fans who have subscribed to score alerts for that team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of recipients for the push notification.

tasks.description: Send a push notification to the subscribers with the new score.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the notification to all subscribed fans.
